segments.text: I can ’ t sleep or eat . I have a really bad pain in my tooth !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you had this toothache ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It bothers me off and on , but it ’ s gotten much worse these past few weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything that you ’ Ve done to your tooth that might have caused the pain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My girlfriend told me that I grind my teeth a lot when I sleep . Maybe that is the problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When you brush your teeth , what do you use ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I use a soft bristle toothbrush .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does it bother you when you have to chew a lot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . That set it off big time !
segments.speaker: S2
